title: Minnesota AG Keith Ellison to Review Shooting Death of Amir Locke
sub_head: Minneapolis police shot Mr. Locke inside his apartment as they executed a search warrant
body:
Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison is reviewing the death of a Black man shot by Minneapolis police early Wednesday morning inside his apartment.
Minneapolis Police officers were executing a search warrant in St. Paul, when they encountered Amir Locke, 22 years old, according to the Minneapolis Police Department.
